quote: Patience, persistence and hard work lead to success and happiness. Or you can do whatever the hell you want and with a bit or a whole lot of luck you'll stumble onto success and happiness.
quote_letters: PATIENCE PERSISTENCE AND HARD WORK LEAD TO SUCCESS AND HAPPINESS OR YOU CAN DO WHATEVER THE HELL YOU WANT AND WITH A BIT OR A WHOLE LOT OF LUCK YOULL STUMBLE ONTO SUCCESS AND HAPPINESS
